summary: Adds a female Nord race follower to the game. Find her in Bilegulch Mine.
descriptionHtml:
Just a basic Nord Race follower with a small touch of freckles added because I didn't want to overdo it. She has amplified health, magicka, stamina, and speed. She will use 1H and 2H handed weapons and a bow. You can also use a mod such as AFT to add spells she can use. If using UFO or AFT remember to put Maybelle ABOVE them in load order to avoid conflicts. Maybelle is 1.0 height and 100 weight. She is Marriageable and can be found in Bilegulch Mine. (One of the same place you are sent to for the Lakeview Manor quest from the Jarl of Falkreath). Her voice is set to Female Sultry also. 

You will need XP32 Maximum Skeleton and HDT for full HDT animation.
Mods Used

Fair Skin Complexion 
Apachii Hair
LIEyes
Brows
Better Freckles
Goma Pero Land
Dynovision

ALL Armor in screens is found all over here.

author: Sapphire
